about_the_game:
We have released a DEMO version that allows you to easily experience baby's crawling movements.
In addition to the main tutorial, mini-games are also implemented. Please, try it.
detailed_description:
We have released a DEMO version that allows you to easily experience baby's crawling movements.
In addition to the main tutorial, mini-games are also implemented. Please, try it.
name: BAB Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i7-6700 CPU @ 3.40GHz 3.40 GHz
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDEA Geforce GTX 960
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • VR Support: Meta Quest 2, Valve Index
  • Additional Notes: OpenXR compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i7-13700 2.10 GHz
  • Memory: 32 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 4070 Ti
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • VR Support: Meta Quest 2, Valve Index
  • Additional Notes: OpenXR compatible

short_description: We have released a DEMO version that allows you to easily experience baby's crawling movements. In addition to the main tutorial, mini-games are also implemented. Please, try it.
